review: The Fire stick worked better then expected.  I used the 30 day free trial of Amazon Prime and it worked beautifully. I am extremely pleased.
author: Dennis E. Makowski

review: This is the best Streaming stick on the market hands down! It has an easy to use interface, a simple control, and it's perfect if you're an Amazon Prime subscriber! The only negative thing about this stick is that it's not customizable. Besides that it is very simple yet perfect. I recommend this to everyone!
author: Manuel Castillo

review: Awesome. Love it. Just want to stay home and hermit with some movies now.
author: VanGrav "hellcat"

review: Works way better than the chromecast. The remote is one reason it is better.  The other reason is it does not lock up all the time when watching Netflix.  Works great with Plex also.
author: John B. Goodrich "Luvmich"

review: Easy to set up and use. Great for NetFlix
author: david mccrady

review: Works great! Better then getting a smart tv.
author: Tyquincia James

review: Great for a tv that doesn't have surround receiver
author: mtlkz

review: Easy to set up and use; Loaded with features.
author: JEL
